00256         // Enable uplink and downlink audio path for speech. 
00257         // The volume level will be level last set with SetVolumeSpeech.
00258         static BOOLEAN InitSpeech();
00259 
00260         // Powers down the audio path, both uplink and downlink.
00261         static BOOLEAN ReleaseSpeech();
00262 
00263         // Change the speaker volume. 
00264         // The audio driver only stores the volume in RAM. 
00265         static BOOLEAN SetVolumeSpeech(SpeechVolume vol);
00266 
00267         // The audio driver only stores the volume in RAM. 
00268         static BOOLEAN MuteSpeech(BOOLEAN mute, MuteDirection dir);
